episodes.name: Emily in Paris
episodes.overview: Emily brings her can-do American attitude and fresh ideas to her new office in Paris, but her inability to speak French turns out to be a major faux pas.

episodes.name: Masculin Féminin
episodes.overview: Emily navigates the intricacies of French amour when her enthusiasm at a work soirée impresses a flirtatious — and married — client.

episodes.name: Sexy or Sexist
episodes.overview: Emily voices her concerns over a risqué new ad campaign while juggling plumbing problems, language lessons and disagreeable co-workers.

episodes.name: A Kiss Is Just a Kiss
episodes.overview: A sweet new acquaintance helps Emily sniff out a potentially huge new client, but a messy workplace liaison endangers the deal.

episodes.name: Faux Amis
episodes.overview: Emily discovers that her growing social media following opens doors in Paris, and a friendly night out on the town leads to a tête-à-tête with Gabriel.

episodes.name: Ringarde
episodes.overview: When a meeting with an iconic couture house unravels over a basic mistake, Emily finds comfort in the company of a seemingly charming professor.

episodes.name: French Ending
episodes.overview: After agreeing to watch over an American actress at a chic red-carpet event, Emily finds her night — and her famous charge — spinning out of control.

episodes.name: Family Affair
episodes.overview: Emily's weekend trip to a friend's château fizzles like day-old champagne. Back in Paris, Mindy's reluctant meet-up with old friends ends on a high note.

episodes.name: An American Auction in Paris
episodes.overview: A charity auction, a donated gown and an avant-garde design duo add up to trouble for Emily as she catches the eye of Pierre Cadault's heir apparent.

episodes.name: Cancel Couture
episodes.overview: With her job on the line over a Fashion Week debacle, Emily scrambles to devise a new plan while preparing to say adieu to a good friend.

episodes.name: Voulez-Vous Coucher Avec Moi?
episodes.overview: Feeling très guilty over her encounter with Gabriel, Emily decides to move on with a romantic weekend away. Mindy's new job turns out to be a total drag.

episodes.name: Do You Know the Way to St. Tropez?
episodes.overview: Working on a weekend? Quelle horreur. Even in Saint-Tropez, Emily can't leave her job behind, but after a social media gaffe, she may not have a choice.

episodes.name: Bon Anniversaire!
episodes.overview: While planning a dinner party for her birthday, Emily gets steamy with Camille’s friends and accepts Gabriel’s helping hand with the menu.

episodes.name: Jules and Em
episodes.overview: When Emily's personal drama impacts her work at Savoir, it pushes her to focus harder on her French lessons. Mindy faces off with a mime at her new gig.

episodes.name: An Englishman in Paris
episodes.overview: Emily tries to practice speaking en Français with a bored classmate while juggling Gabriel's restaurant debut, a Chopard soirée and a seething Camille.

episodes.name: Boiling Point
episodes.overview: Tempers flare on the opening night of Chez Lavaux. Emily feels Alfie has misjudged her style and joie de vivre. Sylvie catches the eye of a photographer.

episodes.name: The Cook, the Thief, Her Ghost and His Lover
episodes.overview: Emily finally establishes a rapport with Alfie, but a borrowed jacket makes things beaucoup awkward. Sylvie bristles over Savoir's new American client.

episodes.name: Champagne Problems
episodes.overview: After a suspiciously decadent dinner with Alfie, Emily heads to Camille's family chateau, where more than just the tops of Champére bottles pop off.

episodes.name: Scents & Sensibility
episodes.overview: Emily's boss from Chicago digs deeper into Savoir's accounts, putting Sylvie on edge. Mindy's budding romance suffers a blow when her secret comes out.

episodes.name: French Revolution
episodes.overview: Emily finds her loyalties torn when a fashion show at Versailles sets the stage for a showdown that could determine Savoir's future—and her own.

episodes.name: I Have Two Lovers
episodes.overview: An impromptu coiffure change is Emily's only quick decision as she drags her heels over choosing a path forward for her career and her love life.

episodes.name: What's It All About...
episodes.overview: With Savoir spiraling into chaos, Emily reaches out to a former colleague for help. But an attempted détente during a glitzy gala quickly goes south.

episodes.name: Coo D’état
episodes.overview: Sylvie turns on the charm when working conditions deteriorate, Mindy gets up to risqué business backstage, and Emily makes up her mind about what's next.

episodes.name: Live From Paris, It’s Emily Cooper
episodes.overview: While playing tourist in Paris, Emily scores a side hustle that puts her language lessons to the test. Camille hits it off with an intriguing artist.

episodes.name: Ooo La La Liste
episodes.overview: Emily tries to use her influence to land Sylvie a spot on a who's-who list, Mindy bumps into a well-connected old friend, and Alfie throws a party.

episodes.name: Ex-en-Provence
episodes.overview: A luxury car event takes Emily and her crew to a chateau in Provence, where lavender fields, a lavish meal and a surprise guest set off romantic sparks.

episodes.name: How to Lose a Designer in 10 Days
episodes.overview: As a double dose of fashion designer drama strikes Agence Grateau, Mindy asks Emily and Gabriel for backup after she receives an enigmatic invitation.

episodes.name: Fashion Victim
episodes.overview: Things look touch-and-go for Pierre as rumors swirl around his store opening. Sylvie reaches out to an old acquaintance. Emily supports a glum Gabriel.

episodes.name: Love Is in the Air
episodes.overview: Already feeling unsure about where she stands with Alfie, Emily finds herself on shaky ground with Mindy's boyfriend. Gabriel focuses on his future.

episodes.name: Charade
episodes.overview: In between undermining a colleague and helping Gabriel achieve his culinary dream, Emily attends a celebration in Champagne that takes a shocking turn.

episodes.name: Break Point
episodes.overview: One wedding disaster and a viral video later, Emily scrambles to get both her personal and professional affairs in order before the French Open.

episodes.name: Love on the Run
episodes.overview: Worry turns to anger after Emily spills a big secret to Gabriel. Mindy finds a skeleton in JVMA's couture closet. Camille throws Monet at her problems.

episodes.name: Masquerade
episodes.overview: As Gabriel's living situation turns très compliqué, Emily plans a lavish masquerade ball for Maison Lavaux, where feelings are shared — and choices made.

episodes.name: The Grey Area
episodes.overview: Emily seeks a private spot for a romantic rendezvous, Sylvie calls in a favor for Laurent's club opening, and Mindy's relationship hits an impasse.

episodes.name: Trompe l'oeil
episodes.overview: Looks prove deceiving as Agence Grateau hypes a skincare line and Gabriel's restaurant chases a Michelin star. Trouble brews on Camille's shopping trip.

episodes.name: Last Christmas
episodes.overview: After a last-minute change in Christmas plans, Emily detours to a ski chalet in the French Alps, where a day on the slopes takes a bad turn.

episodes.name: Lost in Translation
episodes.overview: Emily acquires a protege courtesy of Sylvie and experiences a communication breakdown with Gabriel. Mindy takes a top-down approach to her new gig.

episodes.name: Back on the Crazy Horse
episodes.overview: Emily's dashing rescuer reappears and extends an enticing invitation. Mindy teases her performance at Crazy Horse. Genevieve overstays her welcome.

episodes.name: Roman Holiday
episodes.overview: As a new neighbor moves in, Emily does the unthinkable and takes a vacation day, saying au revoir to work — and ciao to a charming tour guide in Rome.

episodes.name: All Roads Lead to Rome
episodes.overview: Mixing business with pleasure? Not how Emily wants to spend her time in Italy. The stars align for Gabriel, and Mindy finds inspiration among the ruins.

episodes.name: La Dolce Emily
episodes.overview: Emily muddies her haute heels to sniff out a fresh opportunity, while Sylvie charms Rome's elite with help from a cash-strapped princess.

episodes.name: Got To Be Real
episodes.overview: A fashion faux pas makes Emily question what's authentic and what's not. Mindy gets shaken up when she's enlisted to garnish a colossal cocktail.

episodes.name: Intimissimi Issues
episodes.overview: Sylvie and Giancarlo's on-set squabbles drive their production off-script. A revealing lingerie campaign inspires Emily to bare something deeper.

episodes.name: Rome Has Fallen
episodes.overview: Sylvie braces for premiere-day criticism in Solitano. Mindy dodges a tough conversation. Emily discovers that viral success isn't all roses.

episodes.name: Bonjour Paris!
episodes.overview: Newly returned to Paris, Emily must intervene when a culinary cancellation imperils a hotel opening. Sylvie unexpectedly becomes a plus-one at home.

episodes.name: The One Where Emily Goes to the Embassy
episodes.overview: Nostalgic for a taste of home, Emily indulges her sweet tooth on American soil. A crash course in social media sends Sylvie spying on a frenemy's feed.

episodes.name: Second Chances
episodes.overview: A mic-drop moment turns heads at a fashion industry conference. After a flood of bad PR, a luxury water brand turns to Agence Grateau to stay afloat.

episodes.name: Fashion Statement
episodes.overview: Emily charms a designer's dog to score a meeting. Across town, Sylvie stumbles into scandal at a fête full of family drama.

episodes.name: La Belle Époque
episodes.overview: Marcello's dreams hang by a thread when he lands a coveted showcase with a two-week turnaround. A surprise visitor reminds Emily of a bygone era.

episodes.name: Veni, Vidi, Venezia
episodes.overview: In the sink-or-swim chaos of Venice Fashion Week, Emily scrambles to hit a high-water mark. Back in Paris, the agency faces a tidal wave of its own.
